Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time for 'Request Payment' to be processed after 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Request Payment and the end of the case

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Request Payment'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Request Payment and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Request Payment' after 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time it takes 'Request Payment' to be done after 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to next 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Minimum time it takes from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to next 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time between 'Request Payment' and 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time between 'Request Payment' and 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time between 'Request Payment' and 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Time until 'Request Payment' from the start of the process
Metric: The sum of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time for 'Request Payment' in cases following 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time for 'Request Payment' in cases following 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Request Payment' in cases leading to payment handling
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Request Payment' in cases leading to payment handling
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Request Payment' in cases leading to payment handling
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Request Payment' in cases where the declaration is eventually approved
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'
